# setDepthStoreAction(_:)

**Instance Method**

Configures the store action for the depth attachment.

## Declaration

```swift
func setDepthStoreAction(_ storeAction: MTLStoreAction)
```

## Parameters

- **storeAction**: A store action for the depth attachment that can’t be [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLStoreAction/unknown].

## Discussion

This method changes the render command encoder’s store action for the depth attachment. You can assign the default store action for the depth attachment by configuring the [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLRenderPassAttachmentDescriptor/storeAction] property of its [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLRenderPassDepthAttachmentDescriptor] (see [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLRenderPassDescriptor] and its [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLRenderPassDescriptor/depthAttachment] property).



## Configuring the actions for attachments

- **setColorStoreAction(_:index:)**: Configures the store action for a color attachment.
- **setColorStoreActionOptions(_:index:)**: Configures the store action options for a color attachment.
- **setDepthStoreActionOptions(_:)**: Configures the store action options for the depth attachment.
- **setStencilStoreAction(_:)**: Configures the store action for the stencil attachment.
- **setStencilStoreActionOptions(_:)**: Configures the store action options for the stencil attachment.
